::Aerotaur::
    "I'm fine trinity.  I'm just enjoying the ability to sit for a while."  
He stands up and turns back to Winged Centaur.  "Oh well that's enough of 
that."  He yawns "Boy I'm wiped I think it's a good time for a nap.  Wake me 
when you're all ready to leave."  With that he promptly falls asleep 
(standing of course).
